/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and highlighting the colors of the surroundings. The image captures a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
